name: Decaf Dungeon: A Boss Battle
description:
Decaf Dungeon: A Boss Battle

An entry for the DragonRuby Boss Battle Game Jam.  Controller or Keyboard.

Game Objective

Slay the boss. Without caffeine?

A hot morning cup just might turn this around...

Game Controls

Playing the game: (keyboard)

  • w/a/s/d to move
  • space to shoot
  • enter to advance dialog

Playing the game: (controller)

  • Stick/D-Pad to move
  • A button to shoot
  • B button to advance dialog

Room for Improvement

There are some opportunities to improve.  These things are on the list:

  • Boss attack in phase 2/4 slows down slightly in browser play. (you can download the game if this is an issue)
  • Smart camera zooming would improve gameplay in scenarios where boss too far away from the player.
